https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/m9mWShEhhwO9TrJXfE13HKx6xBg.jpg Second short film by Belén Macías, which shows the unbeatable narrative pulse of a director who has combined film and television work and her unbeatable work directing actors from the beginning, tells the summer story of a teenage girl - played by the renowned actress Adriana Ugarte in one of her first roles - who lives a huge conflict with her elders.
